name: d3-weighted-voronoi
description: D3 plugin which computes a Weighted Voronoi tesselation
author: Kcnarf <fl.franck.lebeau@gmail.com>

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/powerDiagram.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: yarn run test && uglifyjs build/d3-weighted-voronoi.js -c -m -o build/d3-weighted-voronoi.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-weighted-voronoi.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-weighted-voronoi.js build/d3-weighted-voronoi.min.js
